description: For all standard retail mortgage loans secured by a principal residence, the Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio shall not exceed 80% without private mortgage insurance.
compliance_check: Verify that the LTV ratio does not exceed 80%
source_text:
REG-MORT-001 - Retail Mortgage Lending Standards Act
Section: 4.1.a | Effective: 2024-01-01
Text: For all standard retail mortgage loans secured by a principal residence, the Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio shall not exceed 80% without private mortgage insurance.
Param: LTV_Standard_Max | Val: 80.0 | Op: LTE

description: For high-risk borrowers (defined as Credit Score < 600), the maximum allowable Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio is strictly capped at 75%
applies_to: high-risk borrowers with a Credit Score < 600

thresholds.human_readable: Max LTV for high-risk borrowers capped at 75%

compliance_check: Verify that the LTV ratio for high-risk borrowers does not exceed 75%
source_text:
REG-MORT-002 - Retail Mortgage Lending Standards Act
Section: 4.1.b | Effective: 2024-01-01
Text: For high-risk borrowers (defined as Credit Score < 600), the maximum allowable Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio is strictly capped at 75%.
Param: LTV_HighRisk_Max | Val: 75.0 | Op: LTE

description: All mortgage applicants must provide at least two (2) distinct forms of government-issued identification prior to loan origination.
compliance_check: Verify that all mortgage applicants provide at least two distinct forms of government-issued identification prior to loan origination.
source_text:
REG-KYC-105 - Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Directive
Section: 12.3 | Effective: 2023-06-15
Text: All mortgage applicants must provide at least two (2) distinct forms of government-issued identification prior to loan origination.
Param: Min_ID_Count | Val: 2 | Op: GTE

description: Mortgages for properties located in designated 'Zone A' flood areas must require mandatory flood insurance coverage equal to the full replacement cost of the property.
applies_to: properties located in designated 'Zone A' flood areas
compliance_check: Verify that the mortgage contract includes mandatory flood insurance coverage equal to the full replacement cost of the property.
source_text:
REG-ENV-099 - Climate Risk & Flood Protection Act
Section: 22.1 | Effective: 2024-01-01
Text: Mortgages for properties located in designated 'Zone A' flood areas must require mandatory flood insurance coverage equal to the full replacement cost of the property.
Param: Flood_Insurance_Mandatory | Val: True | Op: EQUALS

description: The Debt-to-Income (DTI) ratio for any qualified mortgage must not exceed 43% of the borrower's gross monthly income.
compliance_check: Calculate the DTI ratio and ensure it does not exceed 43%
source_text:
REG-INC-201 - Fair Lending & Affordability Act
Section: 8.4 | Effective: 2023-01-01
Text: The Debt-to-Income (DTI) ratio for any qualified mortgage must not exceed 43% of the borrower's gross monthly income.
Param: DTI_Max | Val: 43.0 | Op: LTE
